DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : Semi experimental Clinical Trial aim verify effectiveness massage lower back pain occupational well assess influence technique perform work activity life team nursing .
DOC.brief_title: Massage Low Back Pain Nursing Staff
DOC.detailed_description: Method : 18 official receive 7-8 massage session , twice per week , protocol point . Data collect baseline , one two month respond 2 questionnaire ( Functional Assessment Oswestry Risk Assessment Movement Transfer Scale ) Numeric Pain Scale .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Voluntary participation study employee availability time submission session 2 . Not pregnant 3 . Hold shift least 6 hour daily 4 . Do go vacation leave care study period 5 . Reporting back pain selfreported confirmed medical diagnosis 6 . Not pass due back pain past 6 month 7 . Do submit spondylolisthesis , disc herniation sciatic pain selfreported confirmed medical diagnosis 8 . Do use antiinflammatory drug 9 . Individuals show great 0 ( zero ) Numerical Pain Scale ( 10 ) Score high 15 Functional Assessment Questionnaire Oswestry Employees leave study lose one session
